name: Neko Dai Suki!
overview: Neko Dai Suki! is game in Tamagotchi style. The player takes care of a small newborn kitten. He can train the kitten in various ways, discipline his animal, give the kitten a pet or a toy mouse, etc. The player can freely walk around, even without his cat — all locations are presented in first person perspective. The game has battery support to save game.
